speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Mrs Wortmann-Kool, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, on the promotion of inland waterway transport: NAIADES, an integrated European Action Programme for inland waterway transport [ 2006/2085(INI) ] ( A6-0299/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Mrs Wortmann-Kool, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, on the promotion of inland waterway transport: NAIADES, an integrated European Action Programme for inland waterway transport [ 2006/2085(INI) ] ( A6-0299/2006 ).
